section.para: Web Services Grid Resource Allocation and Management (GRAM4) component comprises a set of WSRF-compliant Web services to locate, submit, monitor, and cancel jobs on Grid computing resources. GRAM4 is not a job scheduler, but rather a set of services and clients for communicating with a range of different batch/cluster job schedulers using a common protocol. GRAM4 is meant to address a range of jobs where reliable operation, stateful monitoring, credential management, and file staging are important.
